channel.title: Allstar source HELP!
channel.description:
i need help with the npcdrop.cfg im trying to get the npc to drop a lil bit of money but it says drop type and idk what it means by that ik before i deleted all the npcdrops i seen it say 1-5 as npcdrop type can u please let me know what to do to make the drop every time to what item i want.
Please and thank's Xray5
